title: Feeding, Test, Dosing & Observation
body: Fed flakes and algae wafers. Nitrate measured at 5 ppm. Dosed 4 pumps of fertilizer and performed a spot dose of Seachem Excel. The targeted BBA patch has turned fully red, and shrimp have begun grazing it down. Likely only two more days of light spot dosing needed to fully clear the area.

title: Checkpoint — Feeding Pattern Change
body: Began a new feeding rotation: algae wafers will now be added every other day to better support the cleanup crew and maintain natural balance, especially with glass staying consistently clean.

title: Feeding, Dosing & Observations
body: Fed flakes, brine shrimp, and algae wafers. Spot-dosed Seachem Excel. Beginning a new feeding rotation of adding algae wafers every other day to support snail and shrimp activity, especially with glass staying very clean.

title: Feeding, Test & Dosing
body: Fed flakes and two algae wafers. Spot-dosed Seachem Excel. Nitrates measured at ~10 ppm, so an additional 4 pumps of fertilizer were added to maintain nutrient balance and support plant growth.
quick_facts: Fed: flakes + algae wafers. Dosing: Excel spot dose, Thrive 4 pumps

title: Feeding, Test & Dosing & Filtration Update
body: Feeding: Brine shrimp + flakes. Nitrates measured around 5 ppm (low range). Dosed 4 pumps of NilocG Thrive Plus fertilizer and skipped Seachem Excel to avoid stressing sensitive plants. Added a bag of Seachem Matrix to the filter chamber to weigh down floating filter pads, expand biomedia capacity, and support long-term beneficial bacteria stability. Tank remains stable with strong feeding response; fertilizer dose increased today due to the low nitrate reading.
quick_facts: Fed: brine shrimp + flakes. Dosing: Thrive 4 pumps

photos.alt: Filter chamber update with Seachem Matrix bag installed (November 20, 2025)

title: Feeding, Test & Dosing
body: Nitrate tested at 5 ppm. Fed flakes and bloodworms. Spot- and cap-dosed Seachem Excel. BBA nearly gone; only a small area remains in a sensitive plant zone, so treatment is applied carefully to avoid damaging plant tissue.
quick_facts: Fed: flakes + bloodworms. Dosing: Excel spot + cap

title: Feeding
body: Fed algae wafers and flakes for veggie day. Fish responded well and feeding was consistent.

title: Daily Feeding
body: Fed: algae wafers + flakes. Cory cats went straight for the wafers.

title: Mid-Week Check
body: Quick parameter test. Nitrate around 12 ppm. Plants looking healthy, some new growth on the java fern.

title: Varied Diet
body: Fed: flakes + brine shrimp. Fish really love the brine shrimp, lots of activity during feeding time.

title: Weekly Parameters
body: Full water test. Nitrate at 18 ppm, pH stable at 7.2. Dosed Thrive Plus 3 pumps.

title: Maintenance Day
body: Water change 25%. Cleaned filter intake. Trimmed some overgrown java moss. Tank looking great.

title: Evening Feeding
body: Fed: flakes only tonight. Keeping it simple after yesterday's water change.

title: Maintenance
body:
Pre-water-change nitrate tested at 40 ppm, prompting a deep clean with roughly 90% of the sump and 75% of the display refreshed.

Installed a new poly-fil barrier to keep debris out of the pump chamber and maintain water clarity as the system settles post-maintenance.

photos.alt: Top-down view of the sump after installing the new poly-fil barrier. Plants visible in the refugium section.
photos.caption: Top view — new poly-fil layer added above the refugium for debris control.

photos.alt: Front view showing the sump chambers with fresh poly-fil installed for mechanical filtration and flow clarity.
photos.caption: Front view — poly-fil barrier placed to prevent debris from reaching the pump chamber.

photos.alt: Full sump setup showing all chambers after refill. Clear flow path and new filter media in place.
photos.caption: System refilled — flow restored and water clarity improving post-maintenance.

title: Weekly Test
body: Nitrate measured at 20 ppm. Time for a water change this weekend. All fish looking healthy.

title: Feeding, Test & Dosing
body:
Nitrate measured at 20 ppm with the community fed flakes and brine shrimp alongside a spot dose of Seachem Excel.

The last traces of BBA near the random flow generator have cleared, closing out the Post-Treatment Recovery Week on a high note.
quick_facts: Fed: flakes + brine shrimp. Dosing: Excel spot

title: Feeding & Dosing
body:
Fed flakes and bloodworms with a targeted spot dose of Seachem Excel to keep algae pressure light.

Fish activity and appetite remain strong as the system holds steady through Post-Treatment Recovery Week.
quick_facts: Fed: flakes + bloodworms. Dosing: Excel spot

title: Feeding, Test & Dosing
body:
Nitrate tested under 5 ppm. Dosed four pumps of NilocG Thrive Plus and added a spot dose of Seachem Excel.

Fed algae wafers with a pinch of flakes so every fish got a share, keeping nutrients low yet stable during Post-Treatment Recovery Week.
quick_facts: Fed: algae wafers + flakes. Dosing: Thrive 4 pumps, Excel spot

title: Feeding, Dosing & Observation
body:
Fed flakes and brine shrimp with two spot doses of Seachem Excel to keep BBA in check.

Malaysian trumpet snails naturally polished the sump overflow screen, keeping debris away and signaling a "Natural Balance Discovery" milestone as the system self-regulates during Post-Treatment Recovery Week.
quick_facts: Fed: flakes + brine shrimp. Dosing: Excel 2 spot doses
media_alt: Malaysian trumpet snails cleaning the overflow screen

title: Maintenance & Dosing
body:
Pre-water-change nitrate tested between 20–40 ppm (closer to 20). Completed roughly 95% sump and 70% display water changes with a light trim.

Performed spot and cap doses of Seachem Excel as a routine post-change treatment and noted fresh plant growth emerging.
quick_facts: Water change: 95% sump, 70% display. Dosing: Excel spot + cap
